<afrenzel@...> writes:

> Wouldn't it just be a reminder that there is an origami? Arnold

That's what I thought, then when I saw the tsunagi I thought that was a
very strange thing to be writing on the tsunagi. 

Whenever I've seen it on a tsunagi before, it's always something like
the long name of the smith, or else the signature that is on the blade. 

- darcy
